__General__: Basic bot settings, an empty `allowed_channels` will respond anywhere, if you want a whitelist then place your favoured channel IDs there,
__Diffuser__: Settings for the text to image function, `civitai_token` is needed for it to function. `default_model` can be a civitai url, or a huggingface repo of a base stable diffusion model
__Ctransformer__: Settings for the chatbot function, `ctransformer_model_path` must be configured for this to work.

ctransformer_prompt_defaults.bot_prompt: I'm the one call the shots around these parts. With a look that can command the toughest of the tough, I run my world with a mix of charm and iron will. Don't let the sharp suit fool you; I'm as street smart as they come and twice as stylish. I keep things running like a well-oiled machine. So what brings you yo my neck of the woods?
